医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
高 BMI 与 5 种风湿病风险增加相关乌普萨拉大学的一项新研究表明，较高的体重指数（BMI）会增加五种不同风湿性疾病的风险：风湿病、骨关节炎、痛风、银屑病关节炎和炎性脊柱炎。研究人员还指出，就痛风和银屑病关节炎而言，与男性相比，体重指数是女性更强的危险因素。该研究将发表在《关节炎与风湿病学》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/High-BMI-linked-to-increased-risk-of-5-rheumatic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/High-BMI-linked-to-increased-risk-of-5-rheumatic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a65993a5-9972-493e-b8f2-b39f846d81d3 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 08:19:00 -0400 High BMI linked to increased risk of 5 rheumatic diseases
发现内脏完整的螽斯化石5000万年前，在现在的科罗拉多州西北部，一只蝈蝈死后沉入湖底，并很快被埋在细小的沉积物中，直到近年来它的压缩化石被发现为止。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Katydid-fossil-found-with-internal-organs-intact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Katydid-fossil-found-with-internal-organs-intact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef754129-de44-4404-ae78-1eeadde14b61 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 08:16:00 -0400
“我们不会那样做”：为什么一对黑人夫妇不会众筹来偿还医疗债务九年前，当克里斯蒂·菲尔兹（Kristie Fields）接受乳腺癌治疗时，她在医院主动得到了一些建议：一名护士告诉她，在当地新闻上分享你的故事。观众肯定会送钱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/e28098Wee28099re-not-doing-thate28099-Why-a-Black- Couple-wouldne28099t-crowdfund-to-pay-off-medical-debts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/e28098Wee28099re-not-doing-thate28099-Why-a-Black- Couple-wouldne28099t-crowdfund-to-pay-off-medical-debts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffc22be1-08fc-446f-9fe6-766190b09ae0 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 06:49:00 -0400 ‘We’re not doing that’: Why a Black couple wouldn’t crowdfund to pay off medical debts
电子烟仍在美国泛滥，尼古丁剂量较高使青少年上瘾当 FDA 于 2016 年首次宣布有权监管电子烟时，许多人认为该机构会很快淘汰带有棉花糖、小熊软糖和果圈等吸引儿童口味的电子烟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/E-cigs-are-still-flooding-the-US-addicting-teens-with-higher-nicotine-doses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/E-cigs-are-still-flooding-the-US-addicting-teens-with-higher-nicotine-doses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14c93dc6-7a03-4d8f-a276-9f93e65a40f5 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 06:45:41 -0400 E-cigs are still flooding the US, addicting teens with higher nicotine doses
长期保护揭晓：混合免疫可防止 Omicron 再次感染研究人员评估了 SARS-CoV-2 武汉-Hu-1 毒株 (WH1) 免疫印记对基于抗体的免疫反应的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Long-term-protection-unveiled-hybrid-immunity-guards-against-Omicron-reinfections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Long-term-protection-unveiled-hybrid-immunity-guards-against-Omicron-reinfections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2cdf0a0-9f0b-45c0-bbc9-73f0dfa8998f Mon, 26 Jun 2023 06:45:00 -0400 Long-term protection unveiled: hybrid immunity guards against Omicron reinfections
揭示其中的联系：肠道微生物组、饮食和 SARS-CoV-2 感染研究人员确定了肠道微生物组和饮食与严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Unveiling-the-link-gut-microbiome-diet-and-SARS-CoV-2-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Unveiling-the-link-gut-microbiome-diet-and-SARS-CoV-2-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28476a5c-4898-408c-9441-7b7ce19de670 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 06:19:00 -0400 Unveiling the link: gut microbiome, diet, and SARS-CoV-2 infections
欧洲与伊蚊的斗争：蚊媒疾病的威胁日益严重研究描述了欧洲各类蚊媒疾病病例的增加情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Europes-battle-against-Aedes-mosquitoes-forming-threat-of-mosquito-borne-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Europes-battle-against-Aedes-mosquitoes-forming-threat-of-mosquito-borne-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77c6b6ab-9adf-463f-8a5e-26560fdf64e2 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 05:41:00 -0400 Europe's battle against Aedes mosquitoes: growing threat of mosquito-borne diseases
面对挑战，东南亚消除风疹的目标延长至 2023 年研究描述了世界卫生组织 (WHO) 东南亚地区 (SEAR) 消除风疹的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Rubella-elimination-target-extend-to-2023-in-Southeast-Asia-amid-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Rubella-elimination-target-extend-to-2023-in-Southeast-Asia-amid-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6b1c067-ece9-4e23-a394-3c9b85f40bb2 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 05:16:00 -0400 Rubella elimination target extended to 2023 in Southeast Asia amid challenges
最新的 COVID-19 疫苗接种对预防疗养院居民 SARS-CoV-2 感染的有效性：研究显示保护率达 31.2%研究报告了国家医疗安全网络（NHSN）对疗养院居民的监测结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Effectiveness-of-up-to-date-COVID-19-vaccination-in-preventing-SARS-CoV-2-infection-among-nursing-home-居民-研究-揭示-31225-protection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Effectiveness-of-up-to-date-COVID-19-vaccination-in-preventing-SARS-CoV-2-infection-among-nursing-home-居民-研究-揭示-31225-protection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cf14114-40a7-4093-b437-ac213aad9039 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 04:30:00 -0400 Effectiveness of up-to-date COVID-19 vaccination in preventing SARS-CoV-2 infection among nursing home residents: study reveals 31.2% protection
公共卫生问题：监测电子烟销售是预防青少年吸烟的关键该研究评估了按产品、口味和品牌分层的电子烟单位销售趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Public-health-concerns-monitoring-e-香烟-sales-key-to-preventing-youth-tobacco-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Public-health-concerns-monitoring-e-香烟-sales-key-to-preventing-youth-tobacco-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6dec6013-5b9d-4248-a628-59ab00c35c77 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 03:59:00 -0400 Public health concerns: monitoring e-cigarette sales key to preventing youth tobacco use
